body.name: Wireless Microphones, Rechargeable Dual UHF Dynamic Microphone with Long-Distance UHF Receiver, Plug and Play for Karaoke Singing, Speech, Wedding, Karaoke Singing, Church, PA System

features: 【Please note】 1）Make sure your speaker equipment has a 6.35mm or 3.5mm Mic input jack. 2）Our microphones do not support Bluetooth or AUX connection. 3）You can adjust volume or add sound effect via connected audio equipment.

【Outstanding Audio Performance】XZL Wireless Microphones adopt latest UHF transmission technology, making a stable and fast connection. Up to 120 feet long-distance transmission , no delay and no cut-off, providing a larger flexibility in different scenes. Perfect for Karaoke singing, Presentation, Speech, Outdoor Activities, Wedding, Stage Performance, Conference, Church, Interview, Home party and more.

【Rechargeable & Portable】 Built-in rechargeable 1200mAh battery in both microphones and UHF receiver, enabling up to 9 hours of continuous working time on a single charge. The microphones come with a durable PU storage case with metal hook, which makes the microphones easy to carry and storage.

【Plug and Play Super-easy to Use】 Plug the UHF receiver to a 6.35mm or 3.5mm Mic Jack of audio equipment, like Singing machine, Audio/Voice amplifier, Speakers with Mic jack, PA system, Streaming multimedia equipment etc. Then turn on the receiver and wireless microphones, they will pair to each other automatically. Even first-time users can get them started soomthly. *Please note: They are not compatible with AUX jack.

【Clear and Pristine Voice Amplifier】 Comes with high sensitivity professional cardioid dynamic capsule, which picks up clear, pure and full sound, for greater gain while simultaneously eliminating the annoying background noise and howling to some extent.No radiation, Anti-howling, Anti-jamming, constant frequency, Distortion <0.2%. High quality with outstanding audio performance.

【Add or Adjust Sound Effects】 You can adjust the volume or sound effects via the buttons of connected audio equipment to meet your requirements. Amplify your voice to save your throat, spread them to your audience in a high-efficiency way. To get a more clear and full voice, we recommend puting the sound source above the top of microphone pickup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Freedom and Clear Sound
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of using the XZL Wireless Microphone, and I must say, it exceeded all my expectations. This sleek and compact microphone offers a truly liberating experience with its wireless functionality. Setup was a breeze, connecting effortlessly to my device via Bluetooth, and the range was impressive, allowing me to move around without any signal interruptions.The audio quality was exceptional, capturing my voice with crystal clarity and minimal interference. Whether I was using it for presentations, recording vocals, or even karaoke nights, the microphone delivered consistent and professional-grade sound. The adjustable sensitivity control allowed me to fine-tune the audio pickup, adapting to different environments with ease.Battery life was outstanding, lasting through hours of continuous use without needing a recharge. The LED battery indicator was a thoughtful addition, ensuring I never ran out of power unexpectedly. The microphone's build quality felt sturdy and durable, giving me confidence in its longevity.What truly stood out was the innovative noise-cancelling technology, effectively minimizing background noise and ensuring my voice remained the center of attention. This feature proved invaluable during live events and outdoor recordings.In conclusion, the XYZ Wireless Microphone is a remarkable piece of audio equipment that combines seamless wireless connectivity, remarkable sound quality, and thoughtful features. Whether you're a professional presenter, musician, or simply someone who loves hosting gatherings, this microphone is a solid investment that will undoubtedly enhance your audio experiences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the XZL Professional Wireless Microphones for Karaoke Singing, and I am beyond impressed with the performance and features of this fantastic product.The dual UHF dynamic microphones provide crystal-clear sound quality, making every singing session a delight. The rechargeable feature is a game-changer, eliminating the hassle of constantly changing batteries. The long-distance UHF receiver ensures a stable and reliable connection, allowing for seamless and uninterrupted performances.Setting up the microphones is a breeze – it's truly a plug-and-play experience. Whether I'm using them for karaoke nights, speeches, weddings, or in a church setting, the XZL Professional Wireless Microphones deliver exceptional audio clarity and versatility.The sleek design and durable build of the microphones add a professional touch to any event. The range of applications, from karaoke to public address systems, makes these microphones a versatile choice for various occasions.Overall, I highly recommend the XZL Professional Wireless Microphones for anyone in need of reliable, high-quality audio equipment. This product exceeded my expectations, and I am confident it will enhance the audio experience for any event or performance. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Excellent Customer Service!
reviews.reviewText: I run a small theater, and I was looking for a way to add additional handheld wireless mics to our board. This allows me to add two mics through one input, and they do not interfere with our other mike at all. The quality is very good-loud and clear. And extremely easy to use.When I first received it, I was having trouble with the receiver, working without being plugged in. I messaged Customer Service about my problem, and they immediately replaced it. Now everything works excellently!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This iTHE REAL DEAL (NO MICRO-PHONEY)!!!
reviews.reviewText: These microphones are the real deal! Shortly after receiving we had a large outdoor party with over 100 guests. We each had a microphone and we were able to work our way throughout the crowd and no matter where we were the sound was clear and perfect and the signal was strong!! Everyone marveled at how much fun it was to be able to interact with us on the microphones with such clarity and professional sound. The battery life is exceptional. This would be great for large or small gatherings inside or out and perfect for a wedding or large public event. We will be using a lot for parties and fund raisers in the future and excited to use for karaoke. Don't wait, RUN and get your own pair of these microphones and for the price it is a 100% win!!! Enjoy and have fun🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wireless and Rechargeable
reviews.reviewText: I’m a professional singer so I know a lot of mics. These are true solid made and excellent sound coverage. Charging is short time and they last and last so I highly recommend them. Blessings- Mike G.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but didn't suit my purpose
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, audio quality is respectable but not top notch. Good for amplifying live vocals/speech. Works fine but I returned my set because I needed a balanced line-level input. These work best plugging directly into an amp or a 1/8" mini audio jack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mics / Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: Bought a pair these a few months ago to use for Karaoke and have enjoyed them very much. They’re easy to connect to, charge and sound great. You hear almost no static feedback at all, are able to hear very clearly and has great battery life. They stopped working out of blue about a month ago so I contacted their customer service and got a new set pretty quickly which was great! Needless to say, I highly recommend these microphones to anyone that wants a nice clear sound for hours of fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, easy to use - fantastic price
reviews.reviewText: I needed a set of mics for a speaking engagement that called for a moderator and multiple speakers. I read reviews and ratings. This arrived quickly and was so easy to set up. I was ready to go in under 15 mins. The sound was clear and no cracking noises. Mics stayed paired through Bluetooth and 2 mics made it easy for the moderator to be ready for questions without passing the mic back and forth.I expect to use this set for quite a while in the future.Great packaging and easy to understand directions. 5 stars!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product at this price point
reviews.reviewText: Great battery life....storage container...very pleased with this product. I would purchase again.

I purchased these mic’s a year ago. They worked great and my parents loved them but after 5 months they stopped holding their charge. I’m just writing this review now because I just found out that they will now only hold their charge for 20 min. Even if I would’ve known sooner it was still to late to return them. I am now on the search for another set but probably won’t be buying this brand again.
